DataElement.preferredName: Bladder Cancer American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 Pathologic Regional Lymph Node N Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Extent of the regional lymph node involvement for the urinary bladder cancer based on evidence obtained from pathologic examination through completion of definitive surgery.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the pathologic N (nodal) stage of a bladder tumor.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A distensible musculomembranous organ serving as a receptacle for fluid, as the gallbladder.:(NEE-o-PLAY-zha) Abnormal and uncontrolled cell growth.

Concepts.definition: The distensible sac-like organ that functions as a reservoir of urine, collecting from the kidneys and eliminating via the urethra.

A benign or malignant tissue growth resulting from uncontrolled cell proliferation. Benign neoplastic cells resemble normal cells without exhibiting significant cytologic atypia, while malignant cells exhibit overt signs such as dysplastic features, atypical mitotic figures, necrosis, nuclear pleomorphism, and anaplasia. Representative examples of benign neoplasms include papillomas, cystadenomas, and lipomas; malignant neoplasms include carcinomas, sarcomas, lymphomas, and leukemias.

Property.preferredDefinition: Pathologic; caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.:One criteria of the TMN staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

Concepts.definition: Caused by or altered by or manifesting disease or pathology.
One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 10/9/17 tt transferred context/BC; added Reg Status. Updated to use Property based on NCIt concepts

ValueDomain.preferredName: Bladder Cancer American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) Edition 7 N Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A finding about one or more characteristics of bladder cancer, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v7 classification system._A group formed for the purpose of developing a system of clinical staging for cancer that is acceptable to the American medical profession and is compatible with other accepted classifications._One criteria of the TNM staging system. N refers to the extent of lymph node involvement._The extent of a cancer within the body, especially whether the disease has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Bladder cancer in which there is no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Concepts.longName: Bladder Cancer pN0 TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Bladder cancer in which there is no regional lymph node metastasis. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bladder Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bladder Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Bladder cancer with single regional lymph node metastasis in the true pelvis (hypogastric, obturator, external iliac, or presacral lymph node). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Bladder Cancer pN1 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Bladder cancer with single regional lymph node metastasis in the true pelvis (hypogastric, obturator, external iliac, or presacral lymph node). (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bladder Cancer pN2 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bladder Cancer pN2 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Bladder cancer with multiple regional lymph node metastases in the true pelvis (hypogastric, obturator, external iliac, or presacral lymph node metastasis).  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Bladder Cancer pN2 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Bladder cancer with multiple regional lymph node metastases in the true pelvis (hypogastric, obturator, external iliac, or presacral lymph node metastasis).  (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Bladder Cancer pN3 TNM Finding v7

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Bladder Cancer pN3 TNM Finding v7
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Bladder cancer with metastasis to the common iliac lymph nodes. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

Concepts.longName: Bladder Cancer pN3 TNM Finding v7
Concepts.definition: Bladder cancer with metastasis to the common iliac lymph nodes. (from AJCC 7th Ed.)

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Bladder cancer in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)

Concepts.longName: Bladder Cancer pNX TNM Finding v6 and v7
Concepts.definition: Bladder cancer in which the regional lymph nodes cannot be assessed. (from AJCC 6th and 7th Eds.)
